commitMessage:
@@@[CodeRefactor] #4098 Make FE multi module (#4099)

This PR change the FE code structure to maven multi module structure. 
See ISSUE: #4098 for more info.  such as How to resolve conflicts.

@@@Remove primary key type (#4555)

disable unsupported primay key table.  and optimize unique table toSql(). 
make show create table output can exec directly

@@@[Bug] Fix bug that can not repair replica in DECOMMISSION state (#6560)

Fix bug that if a tablet belongs to a colocation table.  and one of its
replica is in DECOMMISSION state. This tablet can not be repaired.

Also fix a bug that quota does not escape in show create table result.

```
COMMENT "a"bc" to COMMENT "a\"bc"
```
